changes: Enhanced security monitoring for WebSocket connections

patterns_discovered: Graceful handling of missing or unexpected origin headers
gotchas_discovered: Potential security risks from misconfigured CORS settings
Importance of logging connection metadata for forensic analysis
Need to handle different client types (browsers vs non-browser clients)
recommendations: Add comprehensive documentation about origin validation logic
Consider adding more granular configuration for allowed origins
Implement alerting mechanism for repeated unexpected origin attempts
Regularly audit and update allowed origins list
